name: Mecha's Negotiations
description:
Hey, Commander, we need to strengthen the southern forefront. Our primary weapon are mechas, which were partialy stolen by our enemy, so we must destroy their outposts, so they can't research them. 

You will be given a full carte blanche for the mechas production.

Good Luck.

Controls:
  • [W,A,S,D + RMB] - Camera Movement;
  • [E,Q + SW] - Camera Rotation;
  • [LMB] - Command/Build;
